column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////This cafe takes their food very seriously and do a fantastic job of their pastries.  However
column2: the place could be much more efficiently run
column3: they run out of the best and popular pastries early and the line is always extremely long when you go for brunch.  Is it worth the wait?  Yes
column4: the quality is fantastic and the ambiance is great.  This is one of my favorites.
